definition: A term commonly used to refer to a female parent or caregiver, typically associated with nurturing, love, and familial bonds. It is often utilized to address or describe one's own biological or adoptive mother, as well as to refer to the concept of motherhood in general.

examples.german: Ich habe meiner Mutter ein Geschenk gegeben.
examples.english: I gave my mother a present.
My mother works as a doctor.

examples.german: Meine Mutter hat mir beim Lernen geholfen.
examples.english: My mother helped me with my studies.
